title: Cavalera Conspiracy - INFLiKTED
description:
Cavalera Conspiracy is a Brazilian thrash metal and hardcore band. The band consists of Max Cavalera on vocals and rhythm guitar, Igor Cavalera on drums, Soulfly guitarist Marc Rizzo and Joe Duplantier from Gojira on bass. The name of the band has been changed from Inflikted to Cavalera Conspiracy due to legal reasons. Cavalera Conspiracy&#039;s debut record is currently expected to be released by Roadrunner Records on March 25, 2008

Tracklist:
01 Inflikted
02 Sanctuary
03 Terrorize
04 Dark Ark
05 Ultra-Violent
06 Hex
07 The Doom Of All Fires
08 Bloodbrawl
09 Nevertrust
10 Hearts Of Darkness
11 Must Kill
(MP3-192)


Max Cavalera - vocals, guitar
Igor Cavalera - drums
Marc Rizzo - guitar
Joe Duplantier - bass
Guest performers:

Rex Brown - bass
Ritchie Cavalera - guest vocals
Dave Peters (Throwdown) - guest vocals
